title: Retrieve savings income
description: This endpoint allows a developer to retrieve savings income for securities or foreign interest. A National Insurance number and tax year must be provided.

securities.description: The container that holds the key value for securities.

taxTakenOff.description: The amount of tax deducted from Gilt Edge interest.

grossAmount.description: The gross amount of Gilt Edge interest including tax deducted.

netAmount.description: The amount of Gilt Edge interest after tax has been deducted.

foreignInterest.description: Financial details about foreign interest income.

amountBeforeTax.description: The total amount of income, in UK pounds, before any foreign tax taken off.

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. The value must in a ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 format.

taxTakenOff.description: The total amount of foreign tax taken off your income.

specialWithholdingTax.description: The total amount of income (in UK pounds) before deducting any Special Withholding Tax (SWT).

taxableAmount.description: The total taxable amount on dividends.

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: A boolean indicating whether foreign tax credit relief has been claimed.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint
